roleset.name: to arrange or manage as a broker

example.name: all arguments
example.text: However , even this admirable plan could become objectionable if the White House gives in to congressional Democratic pressure *trace* to add to the scope of the president 's initiative or *trace* to involve [the independent foundation]-1 in *trace*-1 `` brokering '' federal funds for volunteer projects .
